channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Appointment Booking Calendar

item.title: CVE-2024-0856|2024-03-20T05:00:02.675Z -- Unknown -- Appointment Booking Calendar
item.description: The Appointment Booking Calendar WordPress plugin before 1.3.83 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions via CSRF attacks such as adding a booking to the calendar without paying.
